content: a set of 3 easter spring mini baskets are free crochet patterns on my blog this set of 3 crochet mini easter basket patterns includes a peek a boo bunny lamb and sweet little hatching chick you will be able to whip these up in no time these crochet baskets are worked from the bottom up starting with the basket bottom worked in rounds of double_crochet stitches after completing the bottom of the basket you will stop increasing work the first round in the back loop only and beginning working the color work portion of the basket on the sides the basket sides are worked in the front post double_crochet color work technique which is really simple i have a video tutorial to help you read graphs change colors and carry colors with the front post double_crochet technique as well approximate finished size is 3 75 wide x 3 5 tall which even though smaller than a traditional easter basket it will hold quite a few goodies
